segments.text: Have you been coming to this Laundromat long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been washing clothes here since a few years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't cost me as much to wash here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've just started doing my clothes here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you washing your clothes here now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should just pay someone to fix it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's too expensive to get it fixed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you're just going to wash here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I think that's what I'm going to have to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It costs less to wash here .
segments.speaker: S2
